function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to increased use of virtual reality technology","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases leading to outbreaks and public health crises","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for virtual reality equipment and spaces, and promote regular cleaning and maintenance","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection, antimicrobial materials, touchless interfaces","People":"Users of virtual reality technology, facility owners and managers","Owner":"Health and safety regulators, facility owners and managers"},{"Description":"Lack of physical presence in real-time operations may lead to delayed or inadequate response to health and safety hazards","Impact":"Increased risk of accidents, injuries, and exposure to hazardous conditions","Mitigation":"Develop remote monitoring systems, provide comprehensive training for remote operations, and establish emergency response protocols","Technologies":"IoT sensors, real-time monitoring systems, telepresence technology","People":"Operators and workers conducting remote operations","Owner":"Health and safety regulators, facility owners and managers"},{"Description":"Obsolete hardware and software in the past may have lacked proper infection control measures","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of infectious diseases through contaminated virtual reality equipment","Mitigation":"Upgrade and replace outdated hardware and software, prioritize infection control features in new technology development","Technologies":"Modern virtual reality hardware with antimicrobial coatings, software with remote updating capabilities","People":"Users of virtual reality technology, technology developers","Owner":"Technology developers, facility owners and managers"}]}
